description: Try our easy to follow Meatball Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Peanut free
name: Meatball Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Heat oil in a deep flameproof casserole over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, carrot and celery. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until softened.

Pour passata over vegetables. Half fill bottle with water. Reseal and shake. Pour into casserole. Bring to the boil. Stir in meatballs and pasta, then season. Cover casserole and place in oven. Cook for 25 minutes or until meatballs and pasta are cooked through.
Meanwhile, steam or microwave Brussels sprouts until tender. Serve with meatball casserole topped with chopped parsley.
